title: Mother-Daughter Special
contents:
Time to spoil your mother to a relaxing afternoon in the comfort of her room! Book your upcoming getaway or staycation along with two blowouts; enjoy 50% savings on your mum’s one. Before heading out stop by our lobby bar, The Den, for a complimentary cocktail! The ideal mother-daughter getaway!

 

Must be booked 7-days in advance
seo_title: Mothers Day Hotel Package in New York | WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: Treat your Mum on Mothers Day with a break at WestHouse Hotel New York. Enjoy 50% discount on your mumâ€™s room then visit The Den for a complimentary cocktail!
